# Dr Vrushni Bhuta Fertility Clinic - LLMs.txt

## Overview
Dr Vrushni's Women's Care & Fertility Clinic is a premier fertility and women's healthcare center in Mumbai, India, specializing in IVF, IUI, ICSI, and comprehensive reproductive medicine with personalized, compassionate care.

## Website
- Domain: drvrushni.com
- Location: Mumbai, India
- Phone: +91-8591186575
- Email: info@drvrushni.com

## About Dr. Vrushni Bhuta
- Qualifications: MS OBGY, M.R.M (UK)
- Specialization: Fertility Specialist & Gynaecologist
- Experience: 15+ years in reproductive medicine
- Success Rate: 50-70% for IVF treatments
- Successful Treatments: 5000+ pregnancies
- MMC Registration: 2009020251

## Practice Locations
1. Dr LH Hiranandani Hospital, Powai, Mumbai
2. Surya Hospital & Surya Fertility Clinics, Santacruz West, Mumbai
3. Bookurdoc Nahar Business Centre, Chandivali, Powai, Mumbai

## Services Offered
- In Vitro Fertilization (IVF)
- Intrauterine Insemination (IUI)
- Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI)
- Egg Freezing (Fertility Preservation)
- Embryo Freezing
- Surrogacy Programs
- Donor Programs (Egg/Sperm)
- Preimplantation Genetic Testing (PGT)
- Male Infertility Treatment
- Female Infertility Treatment
- PCOS Management
- Endometriosis Treatment
- Ovulation Induction
- Fertility Counseling

## Key Features
- Evidence-based medical protocols
- Personalized treatment plans
- State-of-the-art embryology lab
- Emotional support and counseling
- Transparent pricing
- Free initial consultation
- Two convenient Mumbai locations
- 500+ Happy Families

## Technology Stack
- Framework: Next.js 15.3.8 (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- UI Components: shadcn/ui
- Analytics: Google Tag Manager (GTM-K7ZTLRMR)
- Icons: Lucide React
- Hosting: Vercel

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- Home: / - Main landing page with clinic overview
- About: /about - Dr. Vrushni Bhuta's credentials and experience
- Treatments: /treatments - Comprehensive list of fertility treatments
- IVF Landing Page: /treatments/ivf - Dedicated IVF treatment landing page
- Contact: /contact - Contact form and appointment booking
- Location: /location - Clinic locations with maps
- Testimonials: /testimonials - Patient success stories
- Gallery: /gallery - Clinic photos and videos
- FAQ: /faq - Frequently asked questions
- Blog: /blog - Fertility education articles
- Privacy Policy: /privacy-policy - Data protection information
- Thank You: /thank-you - Form submission confirmation

### Dynamic Routes
- Treatment Pages: /treatments/[slug] - Individual treatment detail pages
  - Available treatments: iui, icsi, egg-freezing, embryo-transfer, male-infertility, 
    female-infertility, pcos, endometriosis, ovulation-induction, fertility-preservation,
    donor-program, surrogacy, preimplantation-genetic-testing, miscarriage-management,
    reproductive-surgery, fertility-counseling, hormone-therapy, uterine-fibroids,
    unexplained-infertility, recurrent-pregnancy-loss, advanced-maternal-age, pcod
- Blog Posts: /blog/[slug] - Individual blog articles
  - Available: understanding-ivf-complete-guide

## Important Files
- Layout: app/layout.tsx - Root layout with GTM, header, footer
- Sitemap: app/sitemap.ts - Dynamic sitemap generation
- Robots: app/robots.txt - Search engine crawling rules
- Header: src/components/Header.tsx - Navigation header
- Footer: src/components/Footer.tsx - Footer with medical compliance
- Scroll Restoration: components/ScrollRestoration.tsx - Auto-scroll to top on navigation
- Floating Buttons: components/FloatingWhatsApp.tsx, components/FloatingCallButton.tsx

## SEO & Metadata
- Comprehensive meta tags on all pages
- Open Graph tags for social sharing
- Schema.org structured data (Organization, Person, MedicalBusiness)
- Image sitemap at /sitemap-image.xml
- Google Search Console verified
- Optimized for local SEO (Mumbai, Powai, Santacruz)

## Medical Compliance
- MMC Registration: 2009020251 (Dr. Vrushni Bhuta)
- PCPNDT Act Compliance: Strict adherence, no gender determination
- Medical Disclaimers: Present on all treatment pages
- Privacy Policy: HIPAA-compliant data handling
- Legal Framework: All treatments within Indian Medical Law

## Design System
- Primary Color: Purple (#47145a)
- Secondary Color: Orange (#eb9142)
- Gradient: Purple to Orange
- Typography: System font stack with Geist Sans
- Responsive: Mobile-first design
- Animations: CSS-based, reduced motion support

## Accessibility
- WCAG 2.1 compliant
- Screen reader friendly
- Keyboard navigation support
- Alt text on all images
- High contrast ratios

## Performance Optimization
- Next.js App Router for optimal performance
- Image optimization with Next/Image
- Dynamic imports for heavy components
- CSS animations over JavaScript
- Efficient caching strategy
- Minimal JavaScript bundle
